oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Thabat al-ʻAṭṭār : manuscript, 1849
Ijāzah fī al-ḥadīth
Thabat
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ʻAṭṭār, Aḥmad ibn ʻUbayd Allāh , 1725 or 1726-1803 or 1804
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: ʻAṭṭār, Muḥammad Najīb ibn Muḥammad Saʻīd ibn Ḥāmid ibn Aḥmad (former owner.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم نحمدك يا من اسبغ علينا المنة وجعلنا نستعين لخدمة الحديث الشريف النبوي ... :Incipit
وصلى الله على سيدنا محمد وعلى اله وصحبه وسلم تسليما كثيرا تمت بعون الله وحسن توفيقه ... :Colophon
Written in one column, 30 lines per page, in black rubricated in red.
According to colophon, copy completed on 2 Shaʻbān 1265 AH [June 23, 1849 AD] by Muḥammad Anīs.
Ownership statement and seal by Muḥammad Najīb al-ʻAṭṭār.
MS Arab 115. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hadith--Authorities
